SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT549
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message is sent by an account owner to an account servicer (account servicing institution). The account owner may be a global custodian which has an account with its local agent (sub custodian) or an investment management institution or a broker/dealer which has an account with their custodian.
It is used to request one of the following statements:
a) Collateral and Exposure Statement (MT 506)
b) Statement of Holdings (MT 535)
c) Statement of Transactions (MT 536)
d) Statement of Pending Transactions (MT 537)
e) Triparty Collateral and Exposure Statement (MT 569)
f) Statement of Intra-Position Advices (MT 538)
g) Report of Combined Activity (MT 575)
h) Statement of Open Orders (MT 576)
i) Statement of Numbers (MT 577)
j) Statement of Settlement Allegements (MT 586)
It is also used to request one of the following status messages:
a) Collateral Status and Processing Advice (MT 507)
b) Trade Status (MT 509)
c) Settlement Status and Processing Advice (MT 548)
d) Corporate Actions Status and Processing Advice (MT 567)
e) Registration Status and Processing Advice (MT 510)
f) Triparty Collateral Status and Processing Advice (MT 558)

Validation.Comment: Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Function must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T86) :

Code.Name: CANC
Code.Description: Message requesting the cancellation of a previously sent message.

Code.Name: NEWM
Code.Description: New message.

Validation.Comment: Subfunction, when present, must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T85) :

Code.Name: CODU
Code.Description: Message is a copy to a party other than the account owner/account servicer, for information purposes and the message is a duplicate of a message previously sent.

Code.Name: COPY
Code.Description: Message is a copy to a party other than the account owner/account servicer, for information purposes.

Code.Name: DUPL
Code.Description: Message is for information/confirmation purposes. It is a duplicate of a message previously sent.

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Time must be a valid time expressed as HHMMSS (Error code(s): T38) .
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Time must be a valid time expressed as HHMMSS (Error code(s): T38) .
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Time must be a valid time expressed as HHMMSS (Error code(s): T38) .
Number Id must be one of the following codes (Error code(s): K13) :

Code.Description: MT 506 Collateral and Exposure Statement
MT 507 Collateral Status and Processing Advice
MT 509 Trade Status Message
MT 510 Registration Status and Processing Advice
MT 535 Statement of Holdings
MT 536 Statement of Transactions
MT 537 Statement of Pending Transactions
MT 538 Statement of Intra-Position Advices
MT 548 Settlement Status and Processing Advice
MT 558 Triparty Collateral Status and Processing Advice
MT 567 Corporate Action Status and Processing Advice
MT 569 Triparty Collateral and Exposure Statement
MT 575 Report of Combined Activity
MT 576 Statement of Open Orders
MT 577 Statement of Numbers
MT 586 Statement of Settlement Allegements

Validation.Comment: Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Proprietary code (Format Option R) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
If Qualifier is CODE and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: COMP
Code.Description: Statement gives complete information (including information (positions, instruction statuses) which is unchanged).

Code.Name: DELT
Code.Description: Statement contains changes which have not yet been reported (delta report, ie, changes only).

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is SFRE and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: ADHO
Code.Description: Statement is sent following a request by the Receiver.

Code.Name: DAIL
Code.Description: Statement is sent daily (once per day, end-of-day).

Code.Name: INDA
Code.Description: Statement is sent intra-day (multiple reports during the day).

Code.Name: MNTH
Code.Description: Statement is sent monthly (once per month).

Code.Name: WEEK
Code.Description: Statement is sent weekly (once per week).

Code.Name: YEAR
Code.Description: Statement is sent yearly (once per year).

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is STBA and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: CONT
Code.Description: Statement is based on contractual settlement date positions, irrespective of failed instructions.

Code.Name: SETT
Code.Description: Statement is based on actual settlement date positions.

Code.Name: TRAD
Code.Description: Statement is based on trade date positions.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is STTY and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: ACCT
Code.Description: Statement is an accounting statement.

Code.Name: CUST
Code.Description: Statement is a custody statement.

Validation.Comment: Number (Format Option B) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .

SwiftSequence.Name: B
B
SwiftSequence.Description: Statement by Status/Reason and/or by Financial Instrument

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is AFFM and Data Source Scheme is not present, Status Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K25) :

Code.Name: AFFI
Code.Description: Confirmation of the trade has been affirmed.

Code.Name: NAFI
Code.Description: Confirmation of the trade has not been affirmed.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is ALOC and Data Source Scheme is not present, Status Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K25) :

Code.Name: AOLF
Code.Description: Instruction has been fully covered by collateral.

Code.Name: AOLP
Code.Description: Instruction has been partially covered by collateral.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is CALL and Data Source Scheme is not present, Status Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K25) :

Code.Name: CACK
Code.Description: Repo call request is acknowledged/accepted.

Code.Name: DEND
Code.Description: Repo call request is denied.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is CPRC and Data Source Scheme is not present, Status Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K25) :

Code.Name: CAND
Code.Description: Cancellation has been completed.

Code.Name: CANP
Code.Description: Cancellation is pending. It is not known at this time whether cancellation can be affected.

Code.Name: DEND
Code.Description: Cancellation will not be executed.

Code.Name: EXCH
Code.Description: Cancellation has been received at the stock exchange.

Code.Name: INTE
Code.Description: Cancellation has been received at the intermediary.

Code.Name: PACK
Code.Description: Cancellation request has been acknowledged for further processing by the account servicer.

Code.Name: PARF
Code.Description: Order is partially filled, cancellation processing accepted for the remainder.

Code.Name: REJT
Code.Description: Cancellation has been rejected for further processing.

Code.Name: REPR
Code.Description: Cancellation request is in repair.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is EPRC and Data Source Scheme is not present, Status Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K25) :

Code.Name: COMP
Code.Description: Processing has been completed.

Code.Name: PEND
Code.Description: Processing has not been completed.

Code.Name: RECD
Code.Description: Indicates that the funds paid have been reconciled with the funds received from the Agent (meaning that there is no more risk of payment to be reversed).

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is ESTA and Data Source Scheme is not present, Status Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K25) :

Code.Name: APPD
Code.Description: Approved at the relevant meeting, eg, dividend.

Code.Name: CLDE
Code.Description: The offer is closed for acceptance.

Code.Name: LAPS
Code.Description: The event/offer conditions have not been met and the event/offer is terminated or lapsed.

Code.Name: PWAL
Code.Description: Open for acceptance until the next specified deadline in the announcement (if any).

Code.Name: SUAP
Code.Description: Subject to approval at the relevant meeting, eg, dividend.

Code.Name: UNAC
Code.Description: The required level of acceptances specified in the terms of the offer has been achieved but there are still outstanding conditions to fulfil.

Code.Name: WHOU
Code.Description: Wholly unconditional; all conditions specified in the offer document have been satisfied.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is MTCH or INMH and Data Source Scheme is not present, Status Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K25) :

Code.Name: MACH
Code.Description: Instruction has been matched.

Code.Name: NMAT
Code.Description: Instruction has not been matched.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is IPRC and Data Source Scheme is not present, Status Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K25) :

Code.Name: CAN1
Code.Description: Pending cancellation; only one side has been input and a cancellation request has been sent.

Code.Name: CAN2
Code.Description: Pending cancellation; both sides have been input, the trade has not yet been matched, and one side has sent a cancellation request.

Code.Name: CAN3
Code.Description: Pending cancellation; both sides have been input, the trade is matched, and one side has sent a cancellation request.

Code.Name: CAND
Code.Description: Instruction has been cancelled.

Code.Name: CANO
Code.Description: Instruction has been cancelled by another party than the instructing party, e.g. market infrastructure such as a Stock Exchange.

Code.Name: CANP
Code.Description: A cancellation request from yourself for this instruction is pending waiting for further processing.

Code.Name: CGEN
Code.Description: The transaction was created by the account servicer or a third party. It was not instructed directly by the account owner.

Code.Name: COSE
Code.Description: Order is fully executed and the confirmation was sent.

Code.Name: CPRC
Code.Description: Cancellation request from the counterparty is awaiting for your cancellation request.

Code.Name: DFLA
Code.Description: Default action is taken.

Code.Name: DONE
Code.Description: Order is partially filled and no further executions forthcoming for the trading day.

Code.Name: DONF
Code.Description: Order is partially filled and no further executions will take place.

Code.Name: EXCH
Code.Description: Order has been received at the stock exchange.

Code.Name: EXSE
Code.Description: Order was fully executed and the execution sent.

Code.Name: FORC
Code.Description: The message has been sent automatically by the service provider to notify that settlement will not take place.

Code.Name: FUTU
Code.Description: All checks relative to the instruction (except collateral) are successful.

Code.Name: INTE
Code.Description: Order has been received at the intermediary.

Code.Name: MPRC
Code.Description: A modification request from your counterparty for this transaction is pending waiting for your modification request or your consent.

Code.Name: NOTC
Code.Description: Instruction cannot be cancelled as it has already been matched and affirmed.

Code.Name: OPOD
Code.Description: Order is open.

Code.Name: OVER
Code.Description: Quantity of financial instrument of the block trade has been overallocated.

Code.Name: PACK
Code.Description: Instruction has been acknowledged/accepted for further processing by the account servicer.

Code.Name: PAFI
Code.Description: Order has been partially filled and the remaining quantity is warehoused.

Code.Name: PART
Code.Description: Order has been partially cancelled as requested.

Code.Name: PPRC
Code.Description: Processing of the instruction is pending.

Code.Name: REJT
Code.Description: Instruction has been rejected for further processing.

Code.Name: REPR
Code.Description: Instruction is accepted but in repair.

Code.Name: SESE
Code.Description: Settlement instruction has been sent to your custodian.

Code.Name: STIN
Code.Description: Standing instruction has been applied.

Code.Name: SUSP
Code.Description: Trading is suspended by the stock exchange.

Code.Name: TREA
Code.Description: Transaction has been treated (triparty collateral status).

Code.Name: UNDE
Code.Description: Quantity of financial instrument of the block trade has been under allocated.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is RERC and Data Source Scheme is not present, Status Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K25) :

Code.Name: PACK
Code.Description: Registration has been acknowledged/accepted by the issuer/registrar.

Code.Name: REJT
Code.Description: Registration has been rejected by the issuer/registrar.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is REST and Data Source Scheme is not present, Status Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K25) :

Code.Name: ACCP
Code.Description: A part of the collateral is accepted, a part rejected.

Code.Name: ACCT
Code.Description: The claim, substitution, proposal is fully accepted.

Code.Name: REJT
Code.Description: The claim, substitution, proposal is fully rejected.

Code.Name: SUBR
Code.Description: Party A agrees with the return part of the substitution and accepts to wait for the proposal of the new collateral.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is RPRC and Data Source Scheme is not present, Status Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K25) :

Code.Name: DEND
Code.Description: Replacement request cannot be executed.

Code.Name: EXCH
Code.Description: Replacement request previously received from you has been received at the stock exchange.

Code.Name: INTE
Code.Description: Replacement request previously received from you has been received at intermediary (if not stock exchange).

Code.Name: PACK
Code.Description: Replacement request has been accepted for further processing by the account servicer (technical receipt).

Code.Name: PART
Code.Description: Order is partially filled, replacement processing accepted for the remaining.

Code.Name: PEND
Code.Description: Replacement request is pending.

Code.Name: REJT
Code.Description: Replacement request has been rejected for further processing.

Code.Name: REPL
Code.Description: Replacement request has been completed.

Code.Name: REPR
Code.Description: Replacement request previously received from you is in repair.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is SETT and Data Source Scheme is not present, Status Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K25) :

Code.Name: PAIN
Code.Description: Part of the instruction remains unsettled (558).

Code.Name: PEND
Code.Description: Instruction is pending. Settlement at the instructed settlement date is still possible.

Code.Name: PENF
Code.Description: Instruction is failing. Settlement at the instructed settlement date is no longer possible.

Code.Name: SETT
Code.Description: Full settlement (558).

Code.Name: USET
Code.Description: Instruction is unsettled (558).

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is TPRC and Data Source Scheme is not present, Status Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K25) :

Code.Name: DEND
Code.Description: Modification request will not be executed.

Code.Name: MODC
Code.Description: Modification has been completed.

Code.Name: MOPN
Code.Description: Modification is pending. It is unknown at this time whether the modification can be affected.

Code.Name: PACK
Code.Description: Instruction has been acknowledged/accepted by the account servicer.

Code.Name: REJT
Code.Description: Instruction has been rejected for further processing.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is CACK and Data Source Scheme is not present, Reason Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K24) :

Code.Name: ADEA
Code.Description: Received after the account servicer's deadline. Processed on best effort basis.

Code.Name: CALD
Code.Description: Repo call is in process.

Code.Name: CALP
Code.Description: Repo call is processed.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is CAND and Data Source Scheme is not present, Reason Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K24) :

Code.Name: CANI
Code.Description: Instruction has been cancelled as per your request.

Code.Name: CANO
Code.Description: Instruction has been cancelled by another party than the instructing party, e.g. market infrastructure such as a Stock Exchange.

Code.Name: CANS
Code.Description: Instruction has been cancelled by the settlement system.

Code.Name: CANT
Code.Description: Original instruction has been cancelled and replaced due to a Corporate Action.

Code.Name: CANZ
Code.Description: Original instruction has been cancelled and replaced to allow a partial or split settlement.

Code.Name: CORP
Code.Description: Instruction has been cancelled due to a corporate action.

Code.Name: CREG
Code.Description: Instruction has been cancelled by the issuer/registrar.

Code.Name: CSUB
Code.Description: Instruction has been cancelled by the agent.

Code.Name: CTHP
Code.Description: Instruction has been cancelled by a third party.

Code.Name: EXPI
Code.Description: Instruction has expired.

Code.Name: NARR
Code.Description: See narrative field for reason.

Code.Name: SCEX
Code.Description: Instruction has been cancelled; the security no longer exists or is no longer eligible on the market instructed. For corporate action related cancellation, CORP should be used.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is CANP and Data Source Scheme is not present, Reason Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K24) :

Code.Name: ADEA
Code.Description: Received after the account servicer's deadline. Processed on best effort basis.

Code.Name: CDAC
Code.Description: Conditional Delivery is still pending awaiting the cancellation from at least another party.

Code.Name: CONF
Code.Description: Awaiting confirmation of cancellation from the counterparty.

Code.Name: DQUA
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid instructed quantity.

Code.Name: INBC
Code.Description: Not all the instructions part of a pool have been received.

Code.Name: NARR
Code.Description: See narrative field for reason.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is CGEN and Data Source Scheme is not present, Reason Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K24) :

Code.Name: CLAI
Code.Description: Transaction has been generated due to a market claim following a corporate action.

Code.Name: TRAN
Code.Description: Transaction has been generated due to transformation following a corporate action.

Code.Name: SPLI
Code.Description: Transaction has been generated to enable settlement following a shortage of position.

Code.Name: RODE
Code.Description: Transaction has been generated to return a delivery previously instructed.

Code.Name: THRD
Code.Description: Transaction has been generated by a third party, eg, a central counterparty.

Code.Name: COLL
Code.Description: Transaction has been generated for collateral management purposes.

Code.Name: NARR
Code.Description: See narrative field for reason.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is DEND and Data Source Scheme is not present, Reason Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K24) :

Code.Name: ADEA
Code.Description: Received after the account servicer's deadline.

Code.Name: DCAL
Code.Description: Repo call request was denied since another call already applies.

Code.Name: DCAN
Code.Description: Request was denied since the instruction has been cancelled.

Code.Name: DFOR
Code.Description: Repo call request was denied. Call not allowed on the concerned repo, eg, out of delay.

Code.Name: DPRG
Code.Description: Request was denied because the process of settlement is in progress.

Code.Name: DREP
Code.Description: Request was denied because the repo was cancelled.

Code.Name: DSET
Code.Description: Request was denied because the instruction was settled.

Code.Name: IPNC
Code.Description: Instruction has been processed and cannot be cancelled.

Code.Name: LATE
Code.Description: Received after market deadline.

Code.Name: NARR
Code.Description: See narrative field for reason.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is MOPN and Data Source Scheme is not present, Reason Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K24):

Code.Name: CONF
Code.Description: Awaiting confirmation of modification from the counterparty or the market.

Code.Name: NARR
Code.Description: See narrative field for reason.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is NAFI and Data Source Scheme is not present, Reason Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K24) :

Code.Name: NAFF
Code.Description: Counterparty has not affirmed.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is NMAT and Data Source Scheme is not present, Reason Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K24) :

Code.Name: ACRU
Code.Description: Accrued interest amount does not match.

Code.Name: ADEA
Code.Description: Received after the account servicer's deadline. Processed on best effort basis.

Code.Name: CADE
Code.Description: Transaction call delay does not match.

Code.Name: CHAR
Code.Description: Charges amount does not match.

Code.Name: CLAT
Code.Description: Counterparty's instruction was too late for matching.

Code.Name: CMIS
Code.Description: A matching instruction from your counterparty could not be found.

Code.Name: CPCA
Code.Description: Counterparty cancelled their instruction.

Code.Name: DDAT
Code.Description: Settlement date/time does not match.

Code.Name: DDEA
Code.Description: Deal price does not match.

Code.Name: DEAL
Code.Description: Deal amount does not match.

Code.Name: DELN
Code.Description: Direction of the trade does not match. Counterparty expects a delivery from you, not a receipt or vice versa.

Code.Name: DEPT
Code.Description: Place of settlement does not match.

Code.Name: DMON
Code.Description: Settlement amount does not match

Code.Name: DQUA
Code.Description: Quantity of financial instruments does not match.

Code.Name: DSEC
Code.Description: Financial instrument identification does not match, eg, ISIN, financial instrument attributes differs...

Code.Name: DTRA
Code.Description: Counterparty has been contacted or contacted us, and does not recognise the transaction.

Code.Name: DTRD
Code.Description: Trade date does not match.

Code.Name: EXEC
Code.Description: Executing broker's commission does not match.

Code.Name: FORF
Code.Description: Forfeit amount does not match.

Code.Name: FRAP
Code.Description: Payment type does not match: your instruction is free of payment, your counterparty's instruction is against payment or vice versa.

Code.Name: ICAG
Code.Description: Delivering or receiving agent (counterparty) does not match.

Code.Name: ICUS
Code.Description: Delivering or receiving custodian does not match.

Code.Name: IEXE
Code.Description: Buyer (receiver) or seller (deliverer) does not match.

Code.Name: IIND
Code.Description: Common reference does not match.

Code.Name: INPS
Code.Description: The place of safekeeping information does not allow matching to take place.

Code.Name: INVE
Code.Description: Investor party does not match.

Code.Name: LATE
Code.Description: Your instruction was too late for matching.

Code.Name: LEOG
Code.Description: Counterparty is for settlement through Letter of Guarantee (L/G), your instruction is not, or vice versa.

Code.Name: MCAN
Code.Description: Corresponding matching record has been cancelled.

Code.Name: MIME
Code.Description: Market side execution details are missing.

Code.Name: NARR
Code.Description: Other details do not match. See narrative for details.

Code.Name: NCRR
Code.Description: Settlement amount currency does not match.

Code.Name: NMAS
Code.Description: Matching process has not yet started.

Code.Name: PHYS
Code.Description: Counterparty's instruction is physical settlement, your instruction is not, or vice versa.

Code.Name: PLCE
Code.Description: Place of trade does not match.

Code.Name: PLIS
Code.Description: Place of listing does not match.

Code.Name: PODU
Code.Description: The instruction has not been matched. It is a possible duplicate instruction.

Code.Name: REGD
Code.Description: Registration details linked to the transaction are incorrect.

Code.Name: REPA
Code.Description: Termination transaction amount does not match.

Code.Name: REPO
Code.Description: Repurchase rate does not match.

Code.Name: REPP
Code.Description: Premium amount does not match.

Code.Name: RERT
Code.Description: Repurchase rate type does not match.

Code.Name: RTGS
Code.Description: Counterparty is for Real Time Gross Settlement (RTGS) system, you are for non-RTGS or vice versa.

Code.Name: SAFE
Code.Description: Safekeeping account used as matching criteria on the market concerned does not match. This includes Buyer/seller's account, direct client's account at the receiving/delivering agent, or receiving/delivering agent's account at the CSD.

Code.Name: SETR
Code.Description: Settlement transaction type does not match (relates to the settlement transaction type codes available for field :22F::SETR.)

Code.Name: SETS
Code.Description: Settlement system/method does not match (eg, instruction is to settle using settlement system/method A. Counterparty expects settlement to occur using settlement system/method B).

Code.Name: TERM
Code.Description: Closing date/time does not match.

Code.Name: TXST
Code.Description: Disagreement on the tax status of the financial instruments to be settled.

Code.Name: UNBR
Code.Description: Market side trade is unmatched.

Code.Name: VASU
Code.Description: Variable rate support does not match (repo).

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is PACK and Data Source Scheme is not present, Reason Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K24) :

Code.Name: ADEA
Code.Description: Received after the account servicer's deadline. Processed on best effort basis.

Code.Name: LATE
Code.Description: Instruction was received after market deadline.

Code.Name: NARR
Code.Description: See narrative field for reason.

Code.Name: NSTP
Code.Description: Instruction was not STP and had to be processed manually.

Code.Name: RQWV
Code.Description: Instruction registration is accepted but the registration is not in full, ie, not with voting rights.

Code.Name: SMPG
Code.Description: Instruction is accepted but does not comply with the market practice rule published for the concerned market or process

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is PEND and Data Source Scheme is not present, Reason Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K24) :

Code.Name: ADEA
Code.Description: Received after the account servicer's deadline. Processed on best effort basis.

Code.Name: AUTH
Code.Description: Tax reclaim has been sent to the tax authorities.

Code.Name: AWMO
Code.Description: Financial instruments are delivered, but still awaiting money from counterparty.

Code.Name: AWSH
Code.Description: Financial instruments have not yet been received from the counterparty (if receive against payment trade), the money has been delivered.

Code.Name: BATC
Code.Description: Processing batch differs in the counterparty's instruction, eg, daytime/real-time versus overnight.

Code.Name: BENO
Code.Description: Disagreement in beneficial ownership.

Code.Name: BLOC
Code.Description: Your account is blocked, no instruction can settle over the account.

Code.Name: BOTH
Code.Description: Counterparty's instruction and your instruction are on hold/frozen/in a preadvice mode.

Code.Name: CAIS
Code.Description: Awaiting financial instruments from a corporate action issue or other procedure, eg, conversion, dematerialisation, exchange, registration, stamping, splitting.

Code.Name: CDLR
Code.Description: Instruction is in a hold/frozen/preadvice mode infrastructure platform is awaiting release.

Code.Name: CERT
Code.Description: Certificate number error.

Code.Name: CHAS
Code.Description: A chaser/enquiry has been sent.

Code.Name: CLAC
Code.Description: Insufficient deliverable financial instruments in counterparty's account or counterparty does not hold financial instruments.

Code.Name: CLHT
Code.Description: Instructed settlement date does not agree with the settlement date on the Clearing House trade, ie, a specific type of trade in India.

Code.Name: CMON
Code.Description: Insufficient money in counterparty's account.

Code.Name: COLL
Code.Description: Financial instruments are not deliverable as they are pledged as collateral.

Code.Name: CONF
Code.Description: Prior payment credited to account based contractual income collection agreement has been collected from issuer.

Code.Name: CPEC
Code.Description: Counterparty is in receivership (form of bankruptcy where a court appointed person, the receiver, manages the affairs of the business).

Code.Name: CSDH
Code.Description: Central securities depository has set the instruction in a hold/frozen/preadvice mode.

Code.Name: CVAL
Code.Description: Instruction is in a hold/frozen/preadvice mode as it fulfils predefined conditions of a restriction processing type in the market infrastructure platform.

Code.Name: CYCL
Code.Description: Instruction is confirmed in the local market or is ready for settlement, awaiting next settlement cycle.

Code.Name: DENO
Code.Description: Quantity instructed does not match the denomination available/deliverable. Physical financial instruments need to be obtained in deliverable denominated quantities.

Code.Name: DEPO
Code.DetailedName: Refused Deposit for Issue of Depositary Receipts
Code.Description: Deposit of shares for the issuing of depositary receipts has been refused. The allotment granted by the issuer is exceeded by your transaction.

Code.Name: DISA
Code.Description: Exceptional closing of all financial institutions due to natural disaster, eg, earthquake.

Code.Name: DKNY
Code.Description: Counterparty has returned or refused the financial instruments.

Code.Name: DOCC
Code.Description: Awaiting documents, registration instruction or endorsements from counterparty.

Code.Name: DOCY
Code.DetailedName: Awaiting Documents/Registration Instruction/ Endorsements from You
Code.Description: Awaiting documents, registration instruction or endorsements from you.

Code.Name: DQUA
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid instructed quantity.

Code.Name: FLIM
Code.Description: Insufficient deliverable financial instruments in your account as maximum foreign limit has been reached.

Code.Name: FROZ
Code.Description: Financial instruments are blocked at the CSD following a corporate event.

Code.Name: FUTU
Code.Description: Awaiting settlement date. No settlement problems to be reported.

Code.Name: GLOB
Code.Description: Settlement cannot be executed; financial instruments are in global form.

Code.Name: IAAD
Code.Description: Pending reason being investigated.

Code.Name: INBC
Code.Description: Not all the instructions part of a pool have been received.

Code.Name: INCA
Code.Description: Financial instruments require income adjustment, eg, dividend or interest.

Code.Name: IPNC
Code.Description: Instruction has been processed and cannot be cancelled.

Code.Name: LAAW
Code.Description: Awaiting settlement of a purchase to cover failing positions.

Code.Name: LACK
Code.Description: Insufficient financial instruments in your account.

Code.Name: LALO
Code.Description: Financial instruments are out on loan.

Code.Name: LATE
Code.Description: Instruction was received after market deadline.

Code.Name: LINK
Code.Description: Your instruction is pending settlement because the instruction linked to it is pending.

Code.Name: LIQU
Code.Description: Central Bank Liquidity is insufficient.

Code.Name: MCER
Code.Description: Awaiting receipt of adequate certification.

Code.Name: MINO
Code.Description: Quantity instructed is lower than the minimum existing settlement quantity for the financial instrument.

Code.Name: MONY
Code.Description: Insufficient money in your account and/or credit line is insufficient .

Code.Name: MUNO
Code.Description: Quantity instructed is not a multiple of an existing settlement quantity lot for the financial instrument.

Code.Name: NARR
Code.Description: See narrative field for reason.

Code.Name: NCON
Code.Description: Confirmation of settlement has not yet been received.

Code.Name: NEWI
Code.Description: Financial instrument is a new issue and not yet available/tradable.

Code.Name: NMAS
Code.Description: Instruction has not been matched; matching process is not required.

Code.Name: NOFX
Code.Description: A foreign exchange instruction from you is missing.

Code.Name: NPAY
Code.Description: Payment has not been made by issuer.

Code.Name: NSEC
Code.Description: Financial instruments have not been delivered by the issuer.

Code.Name: PART
Code.Description: Trade will settle in partials.

Code.Name: PENR
Code.Description: The instruction is pending receipt of securities, eg, from a purchase, loan etc.

Code.Name: PHCK
Code.Description: Physical financial instruments have been received and are being checked for authenticity.

Code.Name: PHSE
Code.Description: Settlement is physical. Financial instruments are being delivered.

Code.Name: PRCY
Code.Description: Counterparty's instruction is on hold/frozen/in a preadvice mode.

Code.Name: PREA
Code.Description: Your instruction is on hold/frozen/in a preadvice mode.

Code.Name: PRSY
Code.Description: The transaction was put on hold by the system.

Code.Name: REFS
Code.Description: Delivery/receipt was refused because physical financial instruments are not in good order.

Code.Name: REFU
Code.Description: Instruction has been refused or not recognised and is represented automatically.

Code.Name: REGT
Code.Description: Certificates have been lodged with the registrar but rejected due to incomplete documentation or foreign ownership limitation reached.

Code.Name: SBLO
Code.Description: Financial instruments are blocked due to a corporate action event, realignment, etc.

Code.Name: SDUT
Code.Description: Stamp duty information is missing.

Code.Name: SETS
Code.Description: Settlement system/method has been modified at CSD to allow settlement.

Code.Name: TAMM
Code.Description: Trade is being amended in the market.

Code.Name: VLDA
Code.Description: For tax reclaim, the event is pending, the tax reclaim is valid for the tax authorities.

Code.Name: YCOL
Code.Description: Insufficient collateral in your account to execute the instruction.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is PENF and Data Source Scheme is not present, Reason Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K24) :

Code.Name: ADEA
Code.Description: Received after the account servicer's deadline. Processed on best effort basis.

Code.Name: AWMO
Code.Description: Financial instruments are delivered, but still awaiting money from the counterparty.

Code.Name: AWSH
Code.Description: Financial instruments have not yet been received from the counterparty (if receive against payment), the money has been delivered.

Code.Name: BATC
Code.Description: Processing batch differs in the counterparty's instruction, eg, daytime/real-time versus overnight.

Code.Name: BENO
Code.Description: Disagreement in beneficial ownership.

Code.Name: BLOC
Code.Description: Your account is blocked, no instruction can settle over the account.

Code.Name: BOTH
Code.Description: Counterparty's instruction and your instruction are on hold/frozen/in a preadvice mode.

Code.Name: BYIY
Code.Description: A buy-in procedure has started on the market (on your behalf if your instruction is a receipt, by the counterparty if your instruction is a delivery).

Code.Name: CAIS
Code.Description: Awaiting financial instruments from a corporate action issue or other procedure, eg, conversion, dematerialisation, exchange, registration, stamping, splitting.

Code.Name: CANR
Code.Description: A cancellation or confirmation of instruction is required.

Code.Name: CDLR
Code.Description: Instruction is in a hold/frozen/preadvice mode infrastructure platform is awaiting release.

Code.Name: CERT
Code.Description: Certificate number error.

Code.Name: CHAS
Code.Description: A chaser/enquiry has been sent.

Code.Name: CLAC
Code.Description: Insufficient deliverable financial instruments in counterparty's account or counterparty does not hold financial instruments.

Code.Name: CLAT
Code.Description: Counterparty's instruction was too late for settlement (i.e. received too late, matching or settlement problems solved too late).

Code.Name: CLHT
Code.Description: Instructed Settlement date does not agree with the settlement date on the Clearing House trade i.e. a specific type of trade in India.

Code.Name: CMON
Code.Description: Insufficient money in counterparty's account.

Code.Name: COLL
Code.Description: Financial instruments are not deliverable as they are pledged as collateral.

Code.Name: CPEC
Code.Description: Counterparty is in receivership (form of bankruptcy where a court appointed person - the receiver - manages the affairs of the business).

Code.Name: CSDH
Code.Description: Central securities depository has set the instruction in a hold/frozen/preadvice mode.

Code.Name: CVAL
Code.Description: Instruction is in a hold/frozen/preadvice mode as it fulfils predefined conditions of a restriction processing type in the market infrastructure platform.

Code.Name: CYCL
Code.Description: Instruction is confirmed in the local market or is ready for settlement, awaiting next settlement cycle.

Code.Name: DENO
Code.Description: Quantity instructed does not match the denomination available/deliverable. Physical financial instruments need to be obtained in deliverable denominated quantities.

Code.Name: DEPO
Code.DetailedName: Refused Deposit for Issue of Depositary Receipts
Code.Description: Deposit of shares for the issuing of depositary receipts has been refused. The allotment granted by the issuer is exceeded by your transaction.

Code.Name: DISA
Code.Description: Exceptional closing of all financial institutions due to natural disaster, eg, typhoon, flooding, earthquake, hurricane.

Code.Name: DKNY
Code.Description: Counterparty has returned or refused the financial instruments.

Code.Name: DOCC
Code.Description: Awaiting documents, registration instruction or endorsements from counterparty.

Code.Name: DOCY
Code.Description: Awaiting documents, registration instruction or endorsements from you.

Code.Name: FLIM
Code.Description: Insufficient deliverable financial instruments in your account as maximum foreign limit has been reached.

Code.Name: FROZ
Code.Description: Financial instruments are blocked at the CSD following a corporate event.

Code.Name: GLOB
Code.Description: Settlement cannot be executed; financial instruments are in global form.

Code.Name: IAAD
Code.Description: Failing reason being investigated.

Code.Name: INBC
Code.Description: Not all the instructions part of a pool have been received.

Code.Name: INCA
Code.Description: Financial instruments require income adjustment, eg, dividend or interest.

Code.Name: LAAW
Code.Description: Awaiting settlement of a purchase to cover failing positions.

Code.Name: LACK
Code.Description: Insufficient deliverable financial instruments in your account.

Code.Name: LALO
Code.Description: Financial instrument are out on loan.

Code.Name: LATE
Code.Description: Your instruction is too late for settlement, eg, received too late, matching or settlement problems solved too late.

Code.Name: LINK
Code.Description: A linked instruction is pending/failing.

Code.Name: LIQU
Code.Description: Central Bank Liquidity is insufficient.

Code.Name: MINO
Code.Description: Quantity instructed is lower than the minimum existing settlement quantity for the financial instrument.

Code.Name: MLAT
Code.Description: Covering money/financial instruments were received too late for completing settlement on a same day basis.

Code.Name: MONY
Code.Description: Insufficient money in your account and/or credit line is insufficient .

Code.Name: MUNO
Code.Description: Quantity instructed is not a multiple of an existing settlement quantity lot for the financial instrument.

Code.Name: NARR
Code.Description: See narrative field for reason.

Code.Name: NCON
Code.Description: Confirmation of settlement has not yet been received.

Code.Name: NEWI
Code.Description: Financial instrument is a new issue and not yet available/tradable.

Code.Name: NOFX
Code.Description: A foreign exchange instruction from you is missing.

Code.Name: OBJT
Code.Description: Financial instruments are stolen, in dispute, under objection etc.

Code.Name: PART
Code.Description: Trade will settle in partials.

Code.Name: PHCK
Code.Description: Physical financial instruments have been received and are being checked for authenticity.

Code.Name: PHSE
Code.Description: Settlement is physical. Financial instruments are being delivered.

Code.Name: PRCY
Code.Description: Counterparty's instruction is on hold/frozen/in a preadvice mode.

Code.Name: PREA
Code.Description: Your instruction is on hold/frozen/in a preadvice mode.

Code.Name: PRSY
Code.Description: The transaction was put on hold by the system.

Code.Name: REFS
Code.Description: Delivery/receipt was refused because physical financial instruments are not in good order.

Code.Name: REGT
Code.Description: Certificates have been lodged with the registrar but rejected due to incomplete documentation or foreign ownership limitation reached.

Code.Name: SBLO
Code.Description: Financial instruments are blocked due to a corporate action event, realignment, etc.

Code.Name: SDUT
Code.Description: Stamp duty information is missing.

Code.Name: SETS
Code.Description: Settlement system/method has been modified at CSD to allow settlement.

Code.Name: STCD
Code.Description: Discrepancy in the settlement confirmation.

Code.Name: YCOL
Code.Description: Insufficient collateral in your account to execute the instruction.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is PPRC and Data Source Scheme is not present, Reason Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K24) :

Code.Name: ADEA
Code.Description: Instruction was received after the account servicer's deadline. Processed on best effort basis.

Code.Name: BLOC
Code.Description: Your account is blocked, no instruction can settle over the account.

Code.Name: CAIS
Code.Description: Awaiting securities from corporate action issue or other procedures, eg, conversion, dematerialisation, exchange, registration, stamping, splitting etc.

Code.Name: CERT
Code.Description: Certificate number error.

Code.Name: COLL
Code.Description: Securities are not deliverable as they are pledged as collateral.

Code.Name: DENO
Code.Description: Quantity instructed does not match the denomination available/deliverable. Physical securities need to be obtained in deliverable denominated quantities.

Code.Name: DOCY
Code.Description: Awaiting documents, registration instruction or endorsements from you.

Code.Name: FLIM
Code.Description: Insufficient deliverable financial instruments in your account as maximum foreign limit has been reached.

Code.Name: GLOB
Code.Description: Settlement cannot be executed ; Financial Instruments are in global form.

Code.Name: LACK
Code.Description: Insufficient financial instruments in your account.

Code.Name: LALO
Code.Description: Financial instruments are out on loan.

Code.Name: LIQU
Code.Description: Central Bank Liquidity is insufficient.

Code.Name: MINO
Code.Description: Quantity instructed is lower than the minimum existing settlement quantity for the financial instrument.

Code.Name: MONY
Code.Description: Insufficient money in your account and/or credit line is insufficient .

Code.Name: MUNO
Code.Description: Quantity instructed is not a multiple of an existing settlement quantity lot for the financial instrument.

Code.Name: NARR
Code.Description: See narrative field for reason.

Code.Name: NEXT
Code.Description: Next Process is launched. No processing pending problems to be reported.

Code.Name: NOFX
Code.Description: A foreign exchange instruction from you is missing.

Code.Name: YCOL
Code.Description: Insufficient collateral in your account to execute the instruction.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is REJT and Data Source Scheme is not present, Reason Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K24) :

Code.Name: ADEA
Code.Description: Received after the account servicer's deadline. Processed on best effort basis.

Code.Name: BATC
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid processing batch, ie, daytime/real-time while only possible to settle in overnight batch.

Code.Name: BPAR
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid Business Partner Number.

Code.Name: BREF
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid Bank Reference Number.

Code.Name: BUSE
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid type of order.

Code.Name: CADE
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid transaction call delay.

Code.Name: CAEV
Code.Description: Corporate action pending on the financial instrument instructed.

Code.Name: CANC
Code.Description: Option is not valid; it has been cancelled by the market or service provider, and cannot be responded to. Any responses already processed against this option are considered void and new responses will be required.

Code.Name: CASH
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid cash account.

Code.Name: CASY
Code.Description: Impossible standing arrangements override instruction for the cash settlement system.

Code.Name: COMC
Code.Description: Unrecognized or invalid commercialisation contract.

Code.Name: CONL
Code.Description: Concentration limit was exceeded.

Code.Name: CPTY
Code.Description: Deal or exposure is unknown.

Code.Name: DADR
Code.Description: Address details are incorrect or cannot be recognised.

Code.Name: DCAN
Code.Description: Cancellation request was rejected since the instruction has already been cancelled.

Code.Name: DDAT
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid settlement date.

Code.Name: DDEA
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid deal price.

Code.Name: DEPT
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid Place of Settlement.

Code.Name: DISC
Code.Description: Party A does not agree with the call amount.

Code.Name: DISE
Code.Description: Party A does not agree with the exposure amount.

Code.Name: DMON
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid settlement amount.

Code.Name: DORD
Code.DetailedName: Registration Request Data and Order Rejection
Code.Description: Disagreement between the data on the registration request and the order.

Code.Name: DPRG
Code.Description: Cancellation request has been rejected because the instruction process is in progress or has been processed.

Code.Name: DQUA
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid settlement quantity.

Code.Name: DSEC
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid financial instrument identification.

Code.Name: DTRD
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid trade date.

Code.Name: EVNM
Code.Description: Unrecognised corporate action event number.

Code.Name: FEEE
Code.Description: Unrecognized or invalid fee or commission.

Code.Name: ICAG
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid receiving or delivering agent.

Code.Name: ICOL
Code.Description: Insufficient collateral proposed.

Code.Name: ICUS
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid receiving or delivering custodian.

Code.Name: IEXE
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid buyer or seller.

Code.Name: IIND
Code.Description: Unrecognised, invalid or missing Common Reference.

Code.Name: INPS
Code.Description: Unrecognised, invalid or missing Place of Safekeeping.

Code.Name: INIR
Code.Description: The instruction is irrevocable

Code.Name: INNA
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid SLA agreed narrative information.

Code.Name: INTV
Code.Description: Option is not active and can no longer be responded to. Any responses already processed against this option will remain valid, eg, expired option.

Code.Name: INVA
Code.Description: For tax reclaim, the reclaim is invalid for the tax authorities.

Code.Name: INVB
Code.Description: Unrecognised, invalid or missing balance.

Code.Name: INVE
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid investor party. May be used by an executing party to reject an instruction for an investor (or portfolio) for which it is not authorised to act.

Code.Name: INVL
Code.Description: Unrecognised, invalid or missing link

Code.Name: INVN
Code.Description: Unrecognised, invalid or missing lot/sub-balance number.

Code.Name: LACK
Code.Description: Instructed position exceeds the eligible balance.

Code.Name: LATE
Code.Description: Instruction was received after market deadline.

Code.Name: MINO
Code.Description: Quantity instructed is lower than the minimum existing settlement quantity for the financial instrument.

Code.Name: MLEG
Code.Description: Missing legal power for transfer.

Code.Name: MUNO
Code.Description: Quantity instructed is not a multiple of an existing settlement quantity lot for the financial instrument.

Code.Name: NARR
Code.Description: See narrative field for reason

Code.Name: NCRR
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid settlement amount currency.

Code.Name: NMTY
Code.DetailedName: Mismatch Option Number and Option Type
Code.Description: Mismatch between option number and option type.

Code.Name: NRGM
Code.Description: Cancellation request has been rejected since more than one instruction match to the cancellation criteria.

Code.Name: NRGN
Code.Description: Cancellation request has been rejected since the instruction could not be found.

Code.Name: OPNM
Code.Description: Unrecognised option number.

Code.Name: OPTY
Code.Description: Invalid option type.

Code.Name: OWNT
Code.Description: Type of ownership indicated is not correct.

Code.Name: PHYS
Code.Description: Physical settlement is impossible for the instructed financial instrument.

Code.Name: PLCE
Code.Description: Place of trade is unrecognised or invalid.

Code.Name: PLIS
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid place of listing. Used when the security identified is not listed on the market supplied.

Code.Name: REFE
Code.Description: Instruction has a reference identical to another previously received instruction.

Code.Name: REFT
Code.Description: For tax reclaim, the reclaim is refused by the tax authorities.

Code.Name: REPA
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid termination transaction amount.

Code.Name: REPO
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid repurchase rate.

Code.Name: REPP
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid premium amount.

Code.Name: REQM
Code.Description: Registration request to be completed by the buyer and to be forwarded to the issuer is missing.

Code.Name: REQW
Code.Description: Registration request to be completed by the buyer and to be forwarded to the issuer is wrong. You have used the registration request of a different issuer/registrar.

Code.Name: RREA
Code.Description: Registration reason indicated is not correct.

Code.Name: RTGS
Code.DetailedName: Impossible to use the RTGS system instructed
Code.Description: It is not possible to use the RTGS system instructed (NRTG or YRTG).

Code.Name: SAFE
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid message sender's safekeeping account.

Code.Name: SDUT
Code.Description: Required stamp duty information is missing.

Code.Name: SETR
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid settlement transaction type (relates to the settlement transaction type codes available for sequence E field 22F, qualifier SETR).

Code.Name: SETS
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid settlement system/method instructed.

Code.Name: SHAR
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid Shareholder Number.

Code.Name: SIGN
Code.Description: Registration request does not have a valid signature of the owner of the financial instrument.

Code.Name: STAM
Code.Description: Financial instrument has not been stamped and/or duly signed.

Code.Name: STAT
Code.Description: Missing statutes or commercial register or other legal documents.

Code.Name: TERM
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid closing date/time.

Code.Name: TXST
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid tax status of the securities instructed.

Code.Name: ULNK
Code.Description: Linked reference is unknown.

Code.Name: VALR
Code.Description: Account servicer validation rule rejection.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is REPR and Data Source Scheme is not present, Reason Code must contain the following code (Error code(s): K24) :

Code.Name: ADEA
Code.Description: Received after the account servicer's deadline. Processed on best effort basis.

Code.Name: BATC
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid Processing Batch (i.e. daytime/realtime while only possible to settle in overnight batch).

Code.Name: BUSE
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid type of order.

Code.Name: CADE
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid transaction call delay.

Code.Name: CAEV
Code.Description: Corporate action pending on the financial instrument instructed.

Code.Name: CASH
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid cash account.

Code.Name: CASY
Code.Description: Impossible standing arrangements override instruction for the cash settlement system.

Code.Name: COMC
Code.Description: Unrecognized or invalid commercialization contract.

Code.Name: DDAT
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid settlement date (i.e. date is not a settlement date for the instructed market, settlement date is too old ...).

Code.Name: DDEA
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid deal price.

Code.Name: DEPT
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid Place of Settlement.

Code.Name: DMON
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid settlement amount.

Code.Name: DQUA
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid settlement quantity.

Code.Name: DSEC
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid financial instrument identification (i.e. invalid ISIN, security not eligible at the instructed market ...).

Code.Name: DTRD
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid trade date.

Code.Name: FEEE
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid fee or commission.

Code.Name: ICAG
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid receiving or delivering agent.

Code.Name: ICUS
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid receiving or delivering custodian.

Code.Name: IEXE
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid buyer or seller.

Code.Name: IIND
Code.Description: Unrecognised, invalid or missing Common Reference.

Code.Name: INPS
Code.Description: Unrecognised, invalid or missing Place of Safekeeping.

Code.Name: INNA
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid SLA agreed narrative information.

Code.Name: MINO
Code.Description: Quantity instructed is lower than the minimum existing settlement quantity for the financial instrument.

Code.Name: MUNO
Code.Description: Quantity instructed is not a multiple of an existing settlement quantity lot for the financial instrument.

Code.Name: NARR
Code.Description: See narrative field for reason.

Code.Name: NCRR
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid settlement amount currency.

Code.Name: NRGM
Code.Description: Cancellation request is in repair since more than one instruction match to the cancellation criteria.

Code.Name: NRGN
Code.Description: Cancellation request is in repair since the instruction could not be found.

Code.Name: PHYS
Code.Description: Physical settlement is impossible for the instructed financial instrument.

Code.Name: PLCE
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid place of trade.

Code.Name: REFE
Code.Description: Instruction has a reference identical to another previously received instruction.

Code.Name: REPA
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid termination transaction amount.

Code.Name: REPO
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid repurchase rate.

Code.Name: REPP
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid premium amount

Code.Name: RTGS
Code.Description: Impossible to use the RTGS system instructed (NRTG or YRTG).

Code.Name: SAFE
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid message sender's safekeeping account.

Code.Name: SDUT
Code.Description: Required stamp duty information is missing.

Code.Name: SETR
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid settlement transaction type (relates to the settlement transaction type codes available for sequence E field 22F, qualifier SETR).

Code.Name: SETS
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid settlement system/method instructed.

Code.Name: TERM
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid closing date/time.

Code.Name: TXST
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid tax status of the securities instructed.

Code.Name: ULNK
Code.Description: The message was not recognised - unknown linked reference.

Option.Name: B
Option.Specification: (Identification Of Security)(Description Of Security) |(Description Of Security)

Validation.Qualifiers: BASK, COMM, CORP, INDX, LIST, MAST, MITI, PCTI, POOL, PREV, PROG, RELA, TRRF
Validation.Comment: Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)

Name & Address (Format Option Q) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26) .

Proprietary code (Format Option R) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26) .

fieldvalidation.name: U09
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "User has used tag 119 in a message that is not a candidate for special processing"

fieldvalidation.name: C1
fieldvalidation.comment: C1 Statement Date/Time (field :98a::STAT) and Statement Period (field :69a: STAT) are mutually exclusive. This rule applies to sequence A (Error code(s): E79).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Statement Date/Time (field :98a::STAT) and Statement Period (field :69a: STAT) are mutually exclusive. This rule applies to sequence A."

fieldvalidation.name: C2
fieldvalidation.comment: C2 Sequence B Statement by Status/Reason and/or by Financial Instrument and sequence C Statement by Instruction Reference are mutually exclusive (Error code(s): E80).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Sequence B Statement by Status/Reason and/or by Financial Instrument and sequence C Statement by Instruction Reference are mutually exclusive."

fieldvalidation.name: C3
fieldvalidation.comment: C3 "Within each occurrence of sequence B, the qualifier in field 24B must be the same as the code word (Status Code) used with the appropriate qualifier in field 25D of the same occurrence of sequence B. If the Data Source Scheme is present in field :25D:: then the conditional rule does not apply."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Within each occurrence of sequence B, the qualifier in field 24B must be the same as the code word (Status Code) used with the appropriate qualifier in field 25D of the same occurrence of sequence B. If the Data Source Scheme is present in field :25D:: then the conditional rule does not apply."

fieldvalidation.name: C4
fieldvalidation.comment: C4 If the message is a cancellation, ie, Function of the Message (field 23G) is CANC, then subsequence A1 (Linkages) must be present at least once in the message, and in one and only one occurrence of A1, field :20C::PREV must be present; consequently, in all other occurrences of A1, field :20C::PREV is not allowed (Error code(s): E08).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If the message is a cancellation, ie, Function of the Message (field 23G) is CANC, then subsequence A1 (Linkages) must be present at least once in the message, and in one and only one occurrence of A1, field :20C::PREV must be present; consequently, in all other occurrences of A1, field :20C::PREV is not allowed."

fieldvalidation.name: FB-35B-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FB-35B-A ISIN is used at the beginning of Identification of Security (Subfield 1) and must be composed of uppercase letters only (Error code(s): T12).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: $value + " is not a valid Security Identification. Required format is ISIN1!e12!c"

fieldvalidation.name: FB-35B-B
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Not a valid Security Identification. Required format is ISIN1!e12!c";
